conv_ensemble_peaks_cumulative = Ensemble.compute(file_list=map_list,
    callback_loader=peaks_loader, pool=None, thresholds=thresholds_pk).cumsum(1
    )
diff_ensemble = conv_ensemble_peaks_cumulative.apply(lambda s: s.diff(), axis=1
    )
fig, ax = plt.subplots()
for i in range(diff_ensemble.nobs):
    ax.plot(0.5 * (thresholds_pk[:-1] + thresholds_pk[1:]), diff_ensemble.
        values[i])
ax.set_xlabel('$\\kappa$')
ax.set_ylabel('$P(\\kappa)$')
fig.savefig('ensemble_differentiate.png')
